Amada Trading Cards - Japan
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Farm and Monster Rancher Cards: Amada Trading Cards - Japan
By Lisa Shock on Saturday, May 31, 2008 - 12:51 pm:

This is simply a trading card set based on the Monster farm cartoon show. This area will contain a card list for the set.

Total cards: 9 Foil + 56 regular = 65

SP-09SpecialGolem seated, Holly and Genki read map in his lap while Mocchi looks on. Suezo, Tiger, Hare sleep.
